message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $850000. This is a great starting point, and I'm open to negotiations. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $800000. This is a fair price considering the product's unique features and value. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment. What do you think?
I'm glad we're able to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. My counteroffer remains at $750000.

I understand you're sticking to your initial counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to meet you halfway again. I'm offering the product to you for $795000. This is a compromise that still reflects the product's value, but also acknowledges your willingness to negotiate. What do you think?
I appreciate your continued efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. My counteroffer remains at $750000.

I'm not willing to go any higher than $795000, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $785000. This is my final compromise. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $770000.

I'm not willing to go any higher than $785000, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $780000. This is my final compromise. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?
Considering your final offer, I would like to counteroffer at $775000.
